item.title: How Medicaid Cuts Will Cost Some 12 Million People Health Coverage
item.description: Republicans in Congress finally settled on a massive legislative package aimed at realizing President Donald Trump’s domestic agenda, and it won’t come cheap. The bill the Senate and House of Representatives approved in July for Trump to sign into law cuts taxes by some $4.5 trillion over a decade and adds hundreds of billions of dollars in new spending for defense, border wall construction, immigrant detention centers and other administration priorities.
